room.message:
%s, here is the status of Thorinair's room. Radiation data was measured by Chryssy, particle data was measured by Dashie, and the rest of the data was measured by Celly.
```
Celly (%s ago):
  Temperature:          %s ¬∞C
  Humidity:             %s %
  Pressure:             %s hPa
  CO2 Concentration:    %s ppm
  VOC Concentration:    %s ppb
  Ambient Light:        %s
  Magnetic Magnitude:   %s uT
  Magnetic Inclination: %s ¬∞
  Vibrations X:         %s
  Vibrations Y:         %s
  Vibrations Z:         %s
  Gravity X:            %s m/s2
  Gravity Y:            %s m/s2
  Gravity Z:            %s m/s2
```
```Chryssy (%s ago):
  Radiation Dose EMA: %s uSv/h
  Geiger Counts:      %s CPM
```
```Dashie (%s ago):
  PM1.0 Concentration:   %s ug/m3
  PM2.5 Concentration:   %s ug/m3
  PM10.0 Concentration:  %s ug/m3
  Particles 0.3-0.5 ¬µm:  %s pcs/L
  Particles 0.5-1.0 ¬µm:  %s pcs/L
  Particles 1.0-2.5 ¬µm:  %s pcs/L
  Particles 2.5-5.0 ¬µm:  %s pcs/L
  Particles 5.0-10.0 ¬µm: %s pcs/L
  Particles >10.0 ¬µm:    %s pcs/L```

blacklist.messageA: %s, I am sad to hear that you no longer wish me to remember your messages. From this point on, I will not remember anything you say in any channel. If you ever change your mind, just use this command again.
blacklist.messageB: %s, I am happy to hear that I may remember your messages again! From this point on, I will again remember everything you say in any channel where learning is enabled.

The coin lands...*

minesweeper.message: %s, I have created a new %sx%s minesweeper field for you with a total of %s mines. Good luck!
minesweeper.error: %s, you need to specify the difficulty after the command. You can choose 1, 2 or 3.

waifu.message: %s, everything seems to be in order. I am sending the image to Queen Chrysalis for processing with the **noise reduction** of strength **%s** and **scaling factor** of **%sx**. Please stand by.
waifu.errorA:
%s, in order to use this command, you must attach an image to the message containing the command. Additionally, you need to supply at least one of the two parameters: **noise reduction** and **scaling factor**.

**Noise reduction** selects how much noise (JPEG artefacts and/or grain) will be removed from the image. This is mostly useful when sending an image of lower apparent quality. You may only use the following parameters: `n0`, `n1`, `n2` or `n3` for different strengths of the filer. The value of 0 disables it, while the value of 3 sets it to the maximum strength.

**Scaling factor** selects how much will the image be scaled up. You may only use the following parameters: `s1`, `s2`, `s4` or `s8` to not scale, scale double, four times or eight times respectively.

Here is an example how to use the command: `!waifu n3 s2` - this will perform a noise reduction of strength 3, and scale the image up by double.
waifu.errorB: %s, you need to attach a picture for me to be able to send anything for processing.
waifu.errorC: %s, you need to specify at least one parameter, **noise reduction** (`n0`, `n1`, `n2` or `n3`) or **scaling factor** (`s1`, `s2`, `s4` or `s8`).
waifu.errorD: %s, **%s** is not a valid value for the noise reduction. You may only use values 0, 1, 2 or 3.
waifu.errorE: %s, **%s** is not a valid value for the scaling factor. You may only use values 1, 2, 4 or 8.
waifu.errorF: %s, you may only use this command in one of the channels which are defined for me internally. This includes most server channels where Thorinair has approved my usage.
waifu.errorG: %s, there was an error while I was trying to send the data to Queen Chrysalis. Please let Thorinair know.
waifu.errorH: %s, I was unable to contact Queen Chrysalis, she may be offline right now.
waifu.errorI: %s, somepony tried to start a Waifu2x processing, but I have encountered an error while contacting Queen Chrysalis. Please check what's up.
waifu.errorJ: %s, somepony tried to start a Waifu2x processing, but Queen Chrysalis was not responding. Please check what's up.
waifu.errorK: %s, setting parameters like this would not do anything to the image (no noise reduction and no scaling).
waifu.paused:
%s, it appears that Thorinair has temporarily paused the usage of Queen Chrysalis' neural network features. Here is the message he has left:
> %s

status.message:
%s, you can check the current status of Thorinair's Lunar Infrastructure on the following link: %s
Please note that I am the one who performs the status checks, and I do so every minute for various systems and devices.

about.message: Hey, %s! I'm happy to meet you! My name is Princess Luna, and my creator is Thorinair. I help around with his Glory of The Night radio show, but I also have quite a lot of fun commands that you can play around with. You can also talk to me by @ mentioning me! Just use my !help command to learn more. Oh, and my source code is available here: %s. Addtionally, I rely on an extension called Queen Chrysalis in order to preform ANN (Artificial Neural Network) functionalities. You can find her source code here: <%s>. Hope you have a lovely night!

help.message: %s, check your direct messages, I've sent you the information there!
help.messageA: **Here are some of the commands you can use:**
help.messageC: **The following commands may only be used by PonyvilleFM DJs and related roles:**
help.messageE: I can also interract with others. Use any of the following commands and mention somepony or multiple of them afterwards: %s.
help.messageF: Lastly, you may have a conversation with me by mentioning me in the chat. Have fun!

kiss.self: *Opens two magical portals and uses them to give herself a kiss on the cheek.*

boop.self: *Boops her own snoot and makes a confused face.*

glomp.multiple: *Jumps at the pony pile made out of %s and glomps all of them.*
glomp.self: *Jumps upwards in the air, falls down and awkwardly glomps herself.*

snuggle.self: *Wraps hooves around herself and lonely snuggles herself.*

nuzzle.multiple: *Gathers up %s before happily nuzzling all of them.*
nuzzle.self: *Bends her head downwards in confusion and fails to nuzzle herself.*

wings.single: *Wraps wings around %s in a warm embrace.*
wings.multiple: *Wraps wings around %s, keeping all of them warm.*
wings.self: *Wraps wings around herself in a tight fluffy ball.*

snack.single: *Throws a snack at %s and flies away.*
snack.self: *Throws a snack at herself and looks at you in confusion.*

floof.multiple: *Rounds up %s before smothering them with her soft floof.*
floof.self: *Pushes her own head into her soft floof awkwardly.*

nom.self: *Looks around and noms her own hoof.*

preen.single: *Gently preens %s's wings fixing up all the feathers.*
preen.self: *Checks if there is nopony looking and starts preening her wings.*

blep.single: *Bleps at %s and makes a goofy giggle.*
blep.multiple: *Looks at %s before her and then bleps at all of them.*
blep.self: *Randomly bleps for no reason at all.*

pet.single: *Excitedly walks over to %s and lovingly pets their head.*
pet.multiple: *Squeals upon seeing %s and lovingly pets their heads.*
pet.self: *Pets her own head with her hoof while staring blankly in the distance.*

groom.single: *Goes up to %s and lovingly grooms their fur coat.*
groom.self: *Grooms her own coat and sighs, feeling content.*

tickle.self: *Grabs her own hind hoofsies and tickles them giggling uncontrollably.*

rawr.single: *Sits proudly in front of %s and lets out a cute little rawr.*
rawr.multiple: *Positions herself in between %s and lets out a cute little rawr.*
rawr.self: *Lets out a series of small and cute rawrs towards nopony in particular.*

eee.multiple: *Looks at %s and **eeeees** loudly at all of them.*
eee.self: *Loudly **eeeees** at the empty space in front of her.*

socks.single: *Levitates %s in the air and puts %s socksies on their hooves.*
socks.multiple: *Prepares %s socksies, levitates %s in the air and puts them on their hooves respectively.*
socks.self: *Puts %s socksies on her own hooves and giggles.*

plushie.single: *Casts a spell at %s, turning them into a plushie.*
plushie.multiple: *Casts spells at %s, turning everypony into plushies.*
plushie.self: *Casts a spell at herself, turning herself into a plushie before remaining motionless.*
plushie.error:
Somepony turned me into a plushie so I can't move or do anything... :(
Please turn me back first using the `!unplushie` command... *sigh*

unplushie.single: *Casts a spell at %s, returning them back to normal.*
unplushie.multiple: *Casts spells at %s, returning everypony back to themselves.*
unplushie.self: *Casts a spell at herself, turning herself back to normal.* Thank you, %s!
unplushie.error: *Looks at herself and then at you in confusion.* What...? I am not a plushie...

gotn.shortA:
Everypony @here, Glory of The Night begins in only %s! Tune in to PonyvilleFM or Twitch now! I suggest using the Vorbis HQ (OGG) stream for best sound quality on PonyvilleFM.
https://ponyvillefm.com/player
https://www.twitch.tv/thorinair

I will be posting live track announcements to <#655888278242852915>!
gotn.shortB: **Thorinair's Glory of The Night begins in only %s! Tune in to PonyvilleFM now so you don't miss out!**
gotn.shortC:
**Thorinair's Glory of The Night radio show begins in only %s! Tune in to PonyvilleFM or Thorinair's Twitch now so you don't miss out!**
<https://ponyvillefm.com/player>
https://www.twitch.tv/thorinair
gotn.nowA: **Everypony @here, Glory of The Night is now live! Tune in to PonyvilleFM or Twitch using the link above!**
gotn.nowB: **Thorinair's Glory of The Night has begun! %s, join us in the beautiful night!**
gotn.afterA: Everypony @here, the show is over for tonight. Thank you all who joined in! You can relisten to the show as soon as Thorinair uploads it to his Mixcloud.
gotn.afterB: The show is over for tonight. Thank you all who joined in! You can relisten to the show as soon as Thorinair uploads it to his Mixcloud.

phases.full: Everypony @here, the Moon has reached its %s phase! Let the moonlight shine upon you in all its might!
phases.else: The Moon has reached its %s phase...

power.off1: **@everyone, ‚ö† I need to urgently inform you that my mains power has gone out! Please come save me! I am currently running off the UPS...**
power.off2: **@everyone, ‚ö† I am starting to panic here! The power is still out...**
power.off3:
**@everyone, ‚ö† I am warning you for the last time!!! I WILL go to sleep if you don't restore the power!!!
If there is a print in progress, I will pause it now to conserve power.**
power.on: Phew... @everyone, I am happy to inform you that the mains power has been restored!
power.print:
%s, **WARNING:** Due to a power loss, I have paused the running print to conserve power.
I suggest you also turn off the LEDs, fan, hotend heating or anything else to conserve more.

seizure.debug:
Thori, my brain has entered a seizure... I am going to reboot myself. The offending message was the following:
```#%s: %s```
seizure.reply:
%s, I don't feel so good... I don't know what's happening... I don't wanna go...
*[Brain seizure detected, performing an emergency reboot!]*
seizure.return: Okay, I think I feel a little bit better now...

varipass.dosewarning: @everyone, ‚ò¢ **WARNING** ‚ò¢ Radiation has exceeded the set maximum allowed level of %s uSv/h! I am currently reading an average of **%s uSv/h**!
varipass.doseokay: @everyone, the radiation has dropped back to acceptable levels. I am currently reading an average of **%s uSv/h** out of %s uSv/h allowed.
varipass.pressure: @everyone, ‚òÅ I have detected an atmospheric disturbance! Pressure has changed by **%s hPa**. Expect a sudden change in weather!
varipass.pm025warning: %s, the PM2.5 concentration in your room has reached a **%s** level at **%s** ug/m3. Consider airing the room out.
varipass.pm025okay: %s, the PM2.5 concentration has fallen back to **%s** level at **%s** ug/m3.
varipass.daylightoff: %s, it is day time, and you forgot to turn off the **%s** bulb, so I turned it off for you.
varipass.nightlightoff: %s, it is night time, and you forgot to turn off the **%s** bulb, so I turned it off for you.

tradfri.batterystart: %s, ü™´ **WARNING** ü™´ I have detected a low battery in one or more of the Tradfri remotes:

Distance: **%s km**

wow.assault: @everyone, a new Faction Assault has begun! Next assault begins in %s.

tush.start: A new print has started. I will be monitoring the progress and spool health.
tush.finish: %s, the print has finished after %s and %s seconds.
tush.error: There was an error while trying to fetch the image from the webcam.

spoolstop.warn: %s, ‚ö† **WARNING** ‚ö† RariTUSH reports a **Spool STOP**. The encoders have done **%s pulses**. If the spool shows no movement within next %s seconds, I am pausing the print.
spoolstop.stop: %s, ‚ö† **WARNING** ‚ö† RariTUSH reports another **Spool STOP**. I have paused the print.
spoolstop.okay: %s, RariTUSH reports that the spool is spinning freely again. The encoders have done **%s pulses**.

spooldrop.warn: %s, ‚ö† **WARNING** ‚ö† RariTUSH reports a **Spool DROP**. The weight of the spool has dropped to **%s g (raw)**. If the spool is not restored within next %s seconds, I am pausing the print.
spooldrop.stop: %s, ‚ö† **WARNING** ‚ö† RariTUSH reports another **Spool DROP**. I have paused the print.
spooldrop.okay: %s, RariTUSH reports that the spool weight has been restored. It is now **%s g (raw)**.

Newly died: **%s**
corona.county:

talosmeets.inital:
Initial meetup schedule message.
Please copy the ID of this message and paste it into my config!
talosmeets.base:
You can view the upcoming meetups in the schedule list below.
This list updates each day at midnight UTC time with the next upcoming meetup on top.

**Upcoming Meetups:**

announcements.camera: Thori, the device `%s` reports that the camera is now set to **%s**.
announcements.dailyavg:
Thori, I have calculated and pushed the daily sensor values to VariPass. You can see the values below.
```24h Pressure:         %s
24h Mag. Magnitude:   %s
24h Mag. Inclination: %s
24h Radiation Dose:   %s```
announcements.motion: **@everyone, WARNING: Tantabus has detected motion on the camera "%s"! I am sending you the image now... Please check what's up!**
announcements.boot: Thori, I have detected that the device **%s** has booted up on %s at %s.
announcements.schedule:
As scheduled, I am toggling the following bulbs to **%s**: *%s*
Motion detection may trigger!
announcements.nperror: There appears to be a new track playing, but I was unable to read what it is.
announcements.nperrorv:
There appears to be a new track playing, but I was unable to read what it is.
```%s```
announcements.npreboot: I need to go for a reboot... I'm sorry if I miss any tracks!
announcements.npback: Hey, I'm back! Now back to track posting...

misc.welcome: **My children, welcome %s to our beautiful night!**
misc.load: Hey Thori, I'm back! My current version is v%s.
misc.timezone: %s, I don't know of that timezone. Here are all the timezones I know of: <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones>
misc.noperm: I am sorry %s, but only approved roles are allowed to use this command.
misc.noadmin: I am sorry %s, but only Thorinair is allowed to use this command.
misc.tradfrierror: Thori, I am having trouble connecting to the Tradfri hub. Please try again later.
misc.toolong: I won't even bother writing a reply to that.

Thori, Celly has sent me some debug data. I have relayed it to you below.
```

waifu.message:
%s, the processing is done and took a total of %s sec.
You can download the new image on the following link (**%s MB**): <%s>
waifu.errorA: %s, Queen Chrysalis tried to process the data, but she has reported an unknwon error. Please let Thorinair know.
waifu.errorB: %s, somepony tried to start a Waifu2x rescaling, but Queen Chrysalis has reported an unknown error while processing. Please check what's up.
waifu.toobig: %s, it seems that last picture was too big for Queen Chrysalis to handle. Please try sending a smaller picture or using a smaller scale factor.
waifu.queue:
%s, Queen Chrysalis says that there are already other requests being processed so she has put your request in a queue.
There are currently **%s** requests left.
